channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-18680] Insufficient heap during full test runs in Docker container.
item.description:
During verification of releases on the 3.3 line, I often run out of heap during full test runs inside the Docker container. Let's increase the default in MAVEN_OPTS to match trunk.

Additionally, on trunk, the settings are different in Dockerfile vs. Dockerfile_aarch64. We can align those.
item.summary: Insufficient heap during full test runs in Docker container.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
cnauroth opened a new pull request, #5511:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/5511

      1. Description of PR

During verification of releases on the 3.3 line, I often run out of heap during full test runs inside the Docker container. Let's increase the default in `MAVEN_OPTS` to match trunk.

      1. How was this patch tested?

After running `./start-build-env.sh` on branch-3.3:

```
mvn --fail-never clean test -Pnative -Dparallel-tests -Drequire.snappy -Drequire.zstd -Drequire.openssl -Dsurefire.rerunFailingTestsCount=3 -DtestsThreadCount=8
```

Before the patch, this would often fail from running out of heap. After the patch, it works consistently. The new `-Xmx` value was chosen to match the value on trunk.

      1. For code changes:
  • [ X] Does the title or this PR starts with the corresponding JIRA issue id (e.g. 'HADOOP-17799. Your PR title ...')?
  • [ ] Object storage: have the integration tests been executed and the endpoint declared according to the connector-specific documentation?
  • [ ] If adding new dependencies to the code, are these dependencies licensed in a way that is compatible for inclusion under [ASF 2.0](http://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a)?
  • [ ] If applicable, have you updated the `LICENSE`, `LICENSE-binary`, `NOTICE-binary` files?

ayushtkn commented on code in PR #5511:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/5511#discussion_r1153646744

##########
dev-support/docker/Dockerfile_aarch64:
##########
@@ -144,7 +144,7 @@ RUN npm install -g bower@1.8.8
###

  1. Avoid out of memory errors in builds
    ###
    -ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx1536m
    +ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx3072m

Review Comment:
For aarch64 trunk doesn't have this change, worth pushing there as well.

ayushtkn commented on code in PR #5511:

###

    ###
    -ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx1536m
    +ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx3072m

Review Comment:
For aarch64 trunk doesn't have this change, worth pushing there as well.
https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/trunk/dev-support/docker/Dockerfile_aarch64#L77

cnauroth opened a new pull request, #5522:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/5522

      1. Description of PR

The `MAVEN_OPTS` max heap size setting is different between Dockerfile vs. Dockerfile_aarch64 on trunk. The Dockerfile setting is larger to avoid running out of memory during full test runs. Update Dockerfile_aarch64 to match.

      1. How was this patch tested?

```
./start-build-env.sh
mvn --fail-never clean test -Pnative -Dparallel-tests -Drequire.snappy -Drequire.zstd -Drequire.openssl -Dsurefire.rerunFailingTestsCount=3 -DtestsThreadCount=8
```

      1. For code changes:
  • [X] Does the title or this PR starts with the corresponding JIRA issue id (e.g. 'HADOOP-17799. Your PR title ...')?
  • [ ] Object storage: have the integration tests been executed and the endpoint declared according to the connector-specific documentation?
  • [ ] If adding new dependencies to the code, are these dependencies licensed in a way that is compatible for inclusion under [ASF 2.0](http://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a)?
  • [ ] If applicable, have you updated the `LICENSE`, `LICENSE-binary`, `NOTICE-binary` files?

cnauroth commented on code in PR #5511:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/5511#discussion_r1153849194

##########
dev-support/docker/Dockerfile_aarch64:
##########
@@ -144,7 +144,7 @@ RUN npm install -g bower@1.8.8
###

  1. Avoid out of memory errors in builds
    ###
    -ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx1536m
    +ENV MAVEN_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx3072m

Review Comment:
Thanks for the review. Good idea. I requested your review on #5522 for this.
